plot: Shay awakes beneath a bridge with no memory of how he got there. His only clues are two pictures in a car left running above.
title: Suddenly Shay
plot_es: Shay awakes beneath a bridge with no memory of how he got there. His only clues are two pictures in a car left running above.
plot_en: Shay awakes beneath a bridge with no memory of how he got there. His only clues are two pictures in a car left running above.
